author: Special Correspondent
text:
Chemflux’16, an initiative by the Chemical Engineering Association of Chemical Engineering Department, SRM University, offers brain-twisting contests from March 29 to 31. Among them are quiz, photography and treasure hunts. The event, which will see the participation of several colleges, also offers presentations, discussions and lectures. For example, in In the event ‘Industry 911,’ participants will be given a real-life problem faced by chemical engineers. Besides presenting research papers, students can also take part in the special events that will be lined up as part of the festival.

For details, visit www.chemflux.in orwww.face-book.com/chemflux16.

—special correspondent
title: Chemflux’16 from March 29
